website_summaries.verdict: If you want a nutritious treat for your dog that comes in small pieces, you may like these.
pros: Small pieces that are perfect for small dogs and for training
Most dogs are eager to get them
has duck, egg, fruits, and vegetables
cons: Though dogs are tempted by them, their owners complain that they crumble easily
A bit pricey, considering the 10 oz
pack is smaller than the other recipes we reviewed

customer_reviews.title: Looks like crumbs from the larger treats!
customer_reviews.text: Not at all happy with this packaging. Our dog loves Plato Duck Treats. We figured the little size as indicated in the description would be great because we break the originals in half. I received two packages. Both have pieces so tiny that they look like the crumbs left over from the larger packages. AND YOU CANNOT RETURN THEM. What a disappointment in for us and our dog! Again, the original sized Plato Duck Treats are awesome - USA made product. Small Bites are ridiculously small - smaller than the dog food we feed him.
customer_reviews.author: Dayle

customer_reviews.title: Availability to offer a treat to an older pet with a dental issue
customer_reviews.text: My small old long hair dashhound loves this product. My last order were large bites and had to crumble them up but she didn't reject the presentation. My recent order tho rceived just one package hoping the other two arrive prior to her enjoying this one packet. These were suggested by my Veternerian.who has taken care of of her the past three s this years Tho she was adopted and came with a huge dental issue. She is doing well so thanks to the company that produces this treat.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Ann Bone

customer_reviews.title: We do a lot of training with my dogs and try to give them food rewards for good behavior. As far as I can tell these ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go bananas for these. We do a lot of training with my dogs and try to give them food rewards for good behavior. As far as I can tell these are super healthy and very tasty to the pups. They are kind of like a meat floss so they tend to fall apart in my treat bag. But I just squeeze them back together with my finger tips. Also, when I toss them on the ground (as a reward or distraction) the dogs find them easily and they don't roll away like some other treats. Highly recommend all flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great high-value treats for obedience and agility training!
customer_reviews.text: These treats are great! They are very smelly-ideal for training. I have two border collies who both love them. The full pieces are a bit large for training so I break them up and they tend to get a bit stringy and crumbly but usually I can get reasonable tic tac sized pieces that are good for agility practice. Some of the pieces near the bottom do become little dusty crumbs but I have purchased multiple packs and it has never been a significant amount of treats or a big deal. I usually just wait till the bag is empty and put the crumbs and dust on their dinner!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love 'Em!!
customer_reviews.text: Big bag of nice treats that are easy to break and crumble apart with your fingers to mix into food or give to small dogs. Duck seems to be a flavor my dogs really respond to. Adds interest to dog kibble for my aged dogs --14 and 19 respectively! Bag reseals too for freshness. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Windchime33

customer_reviews.title: Best training treats ever, and we've tried them all!
customer_reviews.text: These treats are the bomb! My dogs love them, they crumble easily so you can get loads of training out of a single bag. The salmon are really great, too and my dogs love those equally as much, but the duck are slightly easier to break into tiny pieces - so they are my favorite. I like to get three or four pieces out of each treat, making the small bites even smaller, so we get a lot of training out a single small bite. Bang for the buck, so everyone is happy. Woof!
customer_reviews.author: KarenH

customer_reviews.title: High Value Treats!!!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best treats around. Can cause a funny odor AFTER you break it apart, but this is in the doggy world "high value" treat. Dogs will do anything for it, so good for training. Have been able to crate train my 5 month old and 6 year old puppies. These are definitely not the cheapest treats, but it's a guaranteed winner for anyone who has some trouble looking for something considered high valued.
customer_reviews.author: BubbalandersIII

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a mini version of the Plato Duck Treats I bought before (used to break each treat in half for my 2 lil guys to share)..,but it's not the same. THESE SMELL TERRIBLE and I don't want to carry them on walks bc I must wash my hands after handling. The dogs like the taste but I'm still sorry I bought these
customer_reviews.author: dramamama

customer_reviews.title: My babies absolutely love these!
customer_reviews.text: My babies absolutely love these!!! I’ve bought these in several of the other flavors as well, all have been hits. I’m a raw feeder so nutrition is extra important in this household and I couldn’t be more pleased knowing that I’m treating my doggies to a healthy treat.
customer_reviews.author: MissKelly

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: These are probably my dogs favorite treats! He becomes very motivated to obey if he knows this is the reward. They do crumble so they're not ideal for carrying in a pocket on walks. When we get to the end of the bags, I mix the crumbs with some peanut butter and freeze a little inside the kong that he gets when we leave for work.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: tasty (according to my dogs) but more crumbs than solid material
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I have to agree with another reviewer that the treats fall apart. I also put treats in a pouch or my pocket and that is impossible. When I opened the bag much of it is filled with broken up material. Part of the material could be treats as long as you feed directly from the bag. The other half can only be added to food or a kong as mush. Wondering if anyone from Plato monitors these comments.
customer_reviews.author: Paula E. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Hunting for duck!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I play a game with my dog. I asked her if she wants to hunt for duck. She gets so excited. Since they’re small tidbits I hide 5-7 around the house when she’s not looking. She’s to use her nose. She loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: JA McMahon

customer_reviews.title: My dog says these are tasty treats.
customer_reviews.text: I got these treats for one of my dogs because she had a tooth removed and could only chew on soft things for two weeks. These treats did great. They do tend to crumble some by the bottom of the bag but apparently are still very tasty. It's a pretty big bag and seems great quality. I was happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Caltroon

customer_reviews.title: Fussy eater loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: My almost-14-year-old wheaten terrier lost several teeth and needs soft treats that are small. He is a bit fussy about treats but he loves these. I will be buying more from this same vendor
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethAnn

customer_reviews.title: Our dog emeraldriley loves this! We sprinkle it over ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dog emeraldriley loves this! We sprinkle it over kibble also to entice him. the one caveat is that it sometimes comes closer to dust in terms of consistency rather than biscuts if that makes sense. I use the big chunks for training and the dust i sprinkle over food.
customer_reviews.author: Abe Diaz

customer_reviews.title: My dog love's them
customer_reviews.text: best dog treat ever! i was told by my wise old vet that the dog just wants some form of acknowledgment. quantity or size of the treat is irrelevant. I tried cutting up treats for a few years, but now id rather pay for grain/gluten free tid-bits like these. I use these and crasins for rewards.
customer_reviews.author: raymalee

customer_reviews.title: Dogs ♡♡♡♡♡ this duck treat!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats. Every morning they know they get duck treats and if I don't give them one, one of my dogs starts pouncing at me and starts barking until he gets one. My little chihuahua has a senisive stomach and this is the only treat she can have.
customer_reviews.author: joanna

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves these. The only downside is they ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these. The only downside is they are a bit crumbly. So if you are using a treat pouch it will leave treat crumbles at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: Yes the product falls apart - which I think is great, I have two dogs (one is a puppy one is an adult with no teeth). Dogs don't need the whole treat when training so giving it bits and pieces is a positive. I use carrots and broccoli for training as well as this product. My biggest concern is that it states: made with duck... i would like to know all the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: daisygirl849

customer_reviews.title: Needless to say the Small bites are perfect for our mini doxies and they will do anything ...
customer_reviews.text: Gobble gobble...if the pups had a chance they would demolish the bag in seconds. Needless to say the Small bites are perfect for our mini doxies and they will do anything to get one!
customer_reviews.author: Scooch

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I put them into the Kong Classic ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I put them into the Kong Classic Dog Toy. They roll out really easily because they're small bites but at least I know I'm not overfeeding my dogs with big treats.
customer_reviews.author: swanlight

customer_reviews.title: Great for training
customer_reviews.text: Our dog, and just about any dog that smells them onbus, absolutely loves these treats. I love that they are small bites and soft making them great for training
customer_reviews.author: J&M

customer_reviews.title: This is Olly's favorite treat. We have been giving it to her ...
customer_reviews.text: This is Olly's favorite treat . We have been giving it to her since she was a little puppy as a treat for being good . The ones we receive seem to be dried out and they were very crumbled. They had lost their soft nuggets form . Because this is the only treat we have been buying for her I noticed the difference right away . Hope this is helpful .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes nuts for these. They are cut in pieces and are easy grab for training or stuffing a toy. Smells fine and ingredient list looks good.
customer_reviews.author: B.C.

customer_reviews.title: Came quick; decent price.
customer_reviews.text: I have my dogs complete attention when these treats are present.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas.H.Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good for dog with dental issues.
customer_reviews.text: Just right for my little dog who had most of her top teeth removed. These are soft and easily pulled apart or crumbled and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C.

customer_reviews.title: small bites Plato
customer_reviews.text: these are terrific size for a small dog like ours..(25lbs or less).. they are just right and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: These treats are fantastic. My dog loves the taste
customer_reviews.text: These treats are fantastic. My dog loves the taste. He has always been picky about his dry food so I grind up these treats in a food processor and mix it with his meal and he eats every morsel.
customer_reviews.author: little scientist

customer_reviews.title: My dogs go crazy for these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go crazy for these treats. I am glad to give them something they like that is not filled with junk.
customer_reviews.author: D. Harrod

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them and they work great as rewards for training since you can break them ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them and they work great as rewards for training since you can break them into small pieces
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Great treats for small dogs or dogs who swallow their ...
customer_reviews.text: Great treats for small dogs or dogs who swallow their treats whole! Soft and even the picky dogs I walk love these!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Bjork

customer_reviews.title: High value reward
customer_reviews.text: Both my dogs love these. They are a high value reward, and the dogs get very excited and eager to respond to training when these come out. The treats are not too big, and easy to tear in half so they think they're getting more. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KCinSC

customer_reviews.title: Apparently tasty but too soft!
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes them but they crumble waaayyyy too easily!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene P. Nice

customer_reviews.title: Pup approved
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these and we ran out of treats so I bought two bags here. Came fast and fresh
customer_reviews.author: Kara Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: All I got is a bag of crumbs. Good ingredients, though.
customer_reviews.author: TolkienFan

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool!
customer_reviews.text: I've taught my elder dog some new habits with the help of this wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Guiney

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them but they crumble instantly
customer_reviews.text: First off - my dog LOVES them. So he's the ultimate judge here. I hate them because they crumble instantly. It's made worse because, when we got them from Amazon, they were pretty much all crushed up prior to even opening the package.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a small dog and this is a healthy treat and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good deal. My dog (a 'pittie thang' as my vet calls her) loves them.
customer_reviews.author: PMarie

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these. They are crumbly when they ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. They are crumbly when they arrive, but the bag has lasted me a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved them, but they smelled bad.
customer_reviews.text: I'm training my dog and using treats as incentive. She went crazy over these but they smelled so bad I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: richf7

customer_reviews.title: They work great with four dogs two of which have allergies to ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are obsessed. They work great with four dogs two of which have allergies to everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best treats for training. Your pooch will do anything to get one!!
customer_reviews.author: nyc

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sad considering the money I paid
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if it an Amazon packaging issue, or a product issue. I haven't opened the bag yet - and the entire package is not "small bites", but crumbled product. Was going to use this as a high reward treat while training our new dog. Can't do that now that it is not something I can conveniently use in a treat pouch, or even hold in my hand. Pretty sad considering the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Plato Small Bites Natural Duck 10.5Oz
feature_bullets: REAL MEAT: It's the first ingredient; We air-dry single-source proteins like organic chicken, duck and salmon for the greatest flavor and purest nutrients
AIR-DRIED TREATS: We air-dry, not bake, all of our treats to preserve the foods' inherent nutrients; Taking the extra time also makes our treats especially tasty
ONLY THE GOOD STUFF: You won't find any fillers here; Small Bites are free of added sugars, artificial flavors, by-products, protein-meals, grain, gluten, soy, wheat and corn
TRUSTED TREATS MADE SMART: We're committed to quality so you can feel good about what you're giving your pup; We test every batch of product we make in our in-house lab
FAMILY-OWNED & OPERATED: Small Bites are made and quality-controlled in our own facility in the heart of California, ensuring that every treat we put out is wag-worthy

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
